echo.message: The following ant targets are defined:
clean - cleans out the xbeans directories
clean.jars - cleans out any downloaded jars
docs - builds the JavaDoc documentation in ./build/docs
xmlpublic.jar-builds xmlpublic.jar, containing just the public code
sources - zips up the XmlBeans source code
testbuild - builds, but does not run, the xbean drt

target.name: clean.jars
target.description: Delete any downloaded jars and accompanying licenses

echo.message: Trying to get revision number from Subversion...
If the copy fails, you must check out oldxbean.jar
Bootstrapping currently built xbean.jar without verifying.

patternset.includes: build.xml README.txt xbeanenv.cmd xbeanenv.sh LICENSE.txt NOTICE.txt

target.name: xbean.jar
target.depends: dirs, version, xmlpublic.classes, typeholder.template, typestore.classes, common.classes, typeimpl.classes, xmlcomp.classes, store.classes, saaj_api.classes, marshal.classes, xpath.classes, oldxbean.jar, xsdschema.classes, xmlinputstream.classes, resolver.jar, xbean_xpath.jar, piccolo.classes, tools.classes, jamsupport.classes

target.name: typeimpl.classes
target.depends: dirs, store.classes, repackage.classes, xmlpublic.classes, typeholder.template, typestore.classes, xsdschema.classes, configschema.classes, toolschema.classes, jsr173_1.0.jars, jam.classes

target.name: store.classes
target.depends: dirs, common.classes, xmlpublic.classes, typestore.classes, saaj_api.classes, piccolo.classes

target.name: tools.classes
target.depends: dirs, common.classes, xmlpublic.classes, typestore.classes, saaj_api.classes, piccolo.classes, typeimpl.classes, xmlcomp.classes
